title: Can i ship my pixel phone to be repaired in the US or the UK ?
content:
I bought a Google pixel Xl about 4 years ago from one of the Virgin megastores in the UAE and it is out of warranty now , also there are  no authorized repair centres here in the UAE.
So Can i ship it to one of the authorized countries to be repaired even if it will cost me money?
Hopefully i can.
on the phone's box it says that the phone's imported by :
Google Commerce Ltd, 70 Sir John Rogerson's Quay, Dublin 2, Ireland.
Model : G-2PW2200.
IMEI : 359906070637884
Date of purchase from virgin megastore : 29/11/2016
there's also another number here i think it is the order number from virgin too: 124110

I hope to be helped.
Thanks.
